entries.title_d: A large number of civilian transports were disabled by Imperial raids in the Dantooine system. The intelligence that we have suggests that the Inquisition is looking for a Jedi on these ships. The civilian vessels are drifting in space while the Inquisitions capital ships are closing in and your orders are to beat them to the punch. Your ship is equipped with repair material that can be transfered to the transports. When you feel that you have exhausted your ship, yourself or that you have enough experience to continue your training, you can return to base at anytime.
entries.title: Dantooine system: Duty mission: Rescue civilian transports.
entries.thanks_5: This is the last time I'm getting on a space ship!
entries.thanks_2: I think I just saw my life pass before my eyes..
entries.thanks_1: Lucky for us, you know what you're doing.
entries.taunt_5: Surrender and we may let you live, persist and you will perish!
entries.taunt_4: You thought we would just let you fly out of here? I don't think so Rebel!
entries.taunt_3: No one expects the Imperial Inquisition!
entries.taunt_2: If you don't let us board them, we will destroy them Rebel!
entries.taunt_1: By order of the Imperial Inquisition, cut your engines immediately!
entries.rescue_phase_2_5: The Empire will be so surprised when they come back and we are all gone..hehe.
entries.rescue_phase_2_4: We got the tools, we should be repaired in just a moment.
entries.rescue_phase_2_3: I got a bad feeling about this..
entries.rescue_phase_2_2: Alright, lets get out of here!
entries.rescue_phase_2_1: Hey, is anyone a technician on this piece of junk?
entries.rescue_phase_1_5: I hope we can get out of here before more of them show up.
entries.rescue_phase_1_4: Are you sure about this? What if they come back?
entries.rescue_phase_1_3: Good to see you pilot, lets hurry up and get out of here!
entries.rescue_phase_1_2: I'm not sure this is a good idea, maybe it would be safer to just let them capture us?
entries.recovery_success: Good job pilot, those people are safe. Stand by for further orders.
entries.quest_location_d: Even though the Dantooine system shouldn't be much of a threat to you, the presence of the Imperial Inquisition makes it more dangerous than normal. Stay alert.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the transport to a safer location. Stay alert, the Imperial forces are closing in.
entries.quest_dock_d: Dock with the stranded freighter and transfer the parts it need to be repaired.
entries.panic_5: Please help us pilot, we are not fighters!
entries.panic_3: Looks like the Empire has come to put the nail in our coffin!
entries.panic_2: More of the Empires fighters coming this way!
entries.failed_destroy: All those people... return to base pilot. We'd rather have the Empire catch these people than have them all murdered.
entries.docking_started: Dock and transfer the repair parts and tools over to the transport quickly.
entries.docking_complete: As soon as the transport is running, escort them to safety.
entries.complete: We're jumping to lightspeed, thank you pilot, couldn't have done it without you!
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrival_phase_2: You will find one of the drifting transports near this location. Hurry over there.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Alright pilot, we have a lot of transports that need help. Uploading the coordinates to one.
entries.abort: What?! We won't survive this on our own!
